unittitle_ssm: Autobiography, 6 pp., 1981; Speech at Lenin 100th birthday conference; GM article, published in Soviet Contemporary; Letters to PDW editorial board, 1979-1986; Letters to Gus Hall, 1978-1986; Correspondence with Henry Winston, 1973-1986; "Letters" 1968-1984; "Correspondence" 1973-1985; including George Myers, Carl Winter, Mike Zagarell; Testimonial dinners 1970s-1980s; Articles and speeches on trade union matters circa 1979-1986.

unittitle_ssm: Research material for American Labor: Which Way (1961); Harry Bridges letter, May 3 1971; Research material for CIA and American Labor: The Subversion of the AFL-CIO's Foreign Policy (1967); "Historical trade union materials," 1960s-70s.
